i5.las2peer.services.servicePackage.textProcessor

Class StopWordRemover

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.services.servicePackage.textProcessor.StopWordRemover

  • public class StopWordRemover
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    sathvik, sathvikmail@gmail.com Removes Stop words from the text. By default, lucene stop words are removed. One can specify other included stopwords too.
